9506834.review:
I'm a long time TrackMania fan and I'm glad to see it on Steam, especially the United version. 

[h1]COMMUNITY[/h1]

The community is small nowadays but very welcoming. One of the main selling points in my honest opinion is being in a game that people often congratulate each other after races whenever they get high records or just for the sake of a good round. I gotta say, this is a breath of fresh air in online communities and a very nice atmosphere to be a part of in a competitive game like this one.

[h1]GAME MODES[/h1]

There's 7 other modes available in the United version including Stadium, the "generic" one.
It's kinda hard to find dedicated serves of anything other than Stadium and maybe Coast. After you reach 80k+ LP you might be able to join mixed servers with lots of Island, Rally and the other modes tracks. Anyway, I'll briefly describe them for ya:

[*] [b]Stadium[/b] is the go-to mode for this game. High octane racing and sometimes even technical. Arcade Trackmania, ladies and gentlemen.

[*] [b]Coast[/b] is my favorite mode. It's slowpaced in comparison to Stadium and you can feel the weight of your car really well. You drive on mainly offroad tracks and they're all amazing. Lots of memories playing Coast. Shout out to Coast players out there. You guys are rad.

[*] [b]Island[/b] is pretty insane. Speed demons! Island is quite challenging and frustrating as well. Handling those speedsters is no easy task.

[*] [b]Desert[/b] is like being in Dukes of Hazzard. Watch out for corners, otherwise you're gonna find yourself upside down at the end of every turn. 

[*] [b]Rally[/b] is iffy to say the least. One of the modes nobody actually cares about it, or even knows it exist. You "control" a tiny car that doesn't understand the concept of balance. It'll take you patience to handle those devilspawns.

[*] [b]Snow[/b] can be pretty damn fun and challenging as well. It's mostly a mixture of Rally and Desert. Once you figure out how to get around corners with these bobcats you're good to go!

[*] [b]Bay[/b] rocks! Acceleration is the name of the game. I love how these cars handle, and it's so good once you're nailing every corner going faster than the speed of sound.

[h1]NEGATIVE POINT. YES, ONLY ONE POINT[/h1]


I'll be honest with you - the only one negative point of TrackMania nowadays is its popularity. 
United used to be full of players, but right now things aren't going so well. 

What happened? Well, you see, there's a free version of this game called Nations. In Nations you can only play Stadium. Fair, right? Yes, but Nadeo didn't think so. A few years ago Nadeo had a great idea. 

[i]"What if we implemented a FreeZone system, which basically restrict every free player of playing 1 or 2 tracks in a row and pushes them into a queue, waiting a round to play again?" 

"Genius!"[/i]
(TrackMania Nations only, if you own United you're good to go.)

This FreeZone bollocks almost killed this game, but the players found a way around that and trust me - this game is a LOT of fun, with tor without the United license. Give it a shot on sale. 

Trackmania Turbo is okay too, but, United is where Trackmania really shines.

8641933.review:
This game is so good, even if it may be a bit older. It has a very active community with lost of servers to choose from and they also have a ton of Servers that are Freezone, which allows you to play with all of the people who have Nations Forever. The controls feel really solid, especially since each car type has its own unique handling style that plays into the environments that you play on.

The gameplay is pretty much Trials-esque where you are trying to get from start to finish with the fastest time possible. This is where the game, in my opinion, is the most addicting, as I always find myself trying to shave milliseconds off of my best time. This is VERY TRUE IN THE MULTIPLAYER! You play the game like you would in single player, except you see other players racing at the same time. This makes the game a lot more competetive as you can see how you are in the live standings and see how other players are running the course. 

The best thing about the game, though, would have to be the user generated content. That right there is definitely why I LOVE THIS GAME! If you ever get bored with the tracks that are premade, you can make your own tracks and share them, or get tracks that other users have made. Most of the multiplayer severs that I have played on have custom tracks that are cycled through, which adds to the variety of the game. 

I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who likes the Trials games, as it is pretty much the same concept, but executed in a different way that still holds the replay value of a game like this. If you can, GET IT ON SALE!

7809715.review:
Доброго дня, шановне товариство!

У вас закипає кров від швидкості? У вас паморочиться голова від гулу потужних двигунів? А як щодо мертвих петель, захоплюючих подих стрибків над прірвою чи агресивного швидкісного "дріфту"? Пристебніть паски, пані та панове і зустрічайте: TrackMania United!

Сказати по правді моє знайомство з цією серією почалось ще в 2006 році, коли в магазині дисків з іграми мені приглянувся диск TrackMania Sunrise. Я встановив гру… і зрозумів, що мій погляд на аркадні перегони докорінно змінився. І я зараз поясню чому.

Геймплей. Основна риса - всі наші суперники - привиди. Забудьте про нечесні "силові" прийоми. В світі Трекманії до перемоги веде лише точний розрахунок, тверді руки, витримка і знання траси. Чимось вона мені нагадує платформер: півсекунди притиснув гальмо, акселератор до упору, входиш у віраж… а там прискорення, спідометр зашкалює за 500 км/год, а в голові лише одна думка "Тільки б не врізатись!" і "Чорт, де б ще зрізати пару зайвих секунд".
Так, швидкість - це інша риса цієї аркадної серії. Ситуації, де на спідометрі будуть відображатись числа за 1000 і більше - не рідкість.

Пара слів про вірних друзів гонщика. Всього є 7 типів машин, які завжди мають стандартні параметри (спритні японські джипи, могутні та швидкі суперкари, агресивні "кросовери", прудкі боліди, які нагадують учасників формули-1, ретро-кари, маленькі, але швидкі ралійні "міні" і меланхолічні купе). А тепер головне: керування та поведінка в них РАДИКАЛЬНО різна. Не очікуйте, якщо ви отримали медалі на усіх трасах одного авто, ви з легкістю подолаєте випробування на іншій машині. Ви витратите не одну годину звикаючи до нюансів поведінки вашого залізного коня.

Режими. Всього є 4 режими. Гонка з привидами на час (якщо виб'єте рекорд розробників і не поїдете дахом, можна спробувати скачати привид топових гравців і позмагатись з ним) , платформер (подолати трасу за найменшу кількість спроб), пазл (вам видають певну кількість матеріалів для будівництва траси. Чим швидше проїдете - тим краще) і трюки (набрати певну кількість очок, виконуючи бочки, перевороти тощо за відведений час)
Складність варіюється від "тьху" (білий прапор) до "Твою ж… [censored], та якого ж [censored]! Та що ж за [censored] твою [censored]!!!!!!!!"(синій і червоний). Для тих, хто подолає карти і під червоним прапором, та ще й на золото і при цьому не загримить на лікування чи співбесіду до психіатра… вам стане доступний чорний прапор… Що там за траси - промовчу. Бо хочеться гучно лаятись. На них було в свій час зіпсовано до чорта й більше дорогоцінних і невідновлювальних нервів! 

Перейдемо до мережевого режиму. Він представлений виключно режимом перегонів. Використовується зазвичай для, як кажуть, "себе показати, на інших подивитись". Карти й досі створюються відданими фанатами (і це не зважаючи на 2008 рік випуску). Сумувати не доведеться.
Ви також можете спробувати себе у якості "мапмейкера". Редактор дуже простий і інтуїтивно зрозумілий. В наявності є і редактор зовнішнього вигляду вашого авто.
Також присутній спліт скрін, завдяки якому вечірка в колі віртуальних рейсерів може пройти набагато веселіше, за умови наявності нормального телевізора та достатньої кількості геймпадів. 

Вердикт. Аркада, де все вирішує "прямизна" рук, місце з якого вони ростуть і терпіння.
Всім фанатам жанру аркадних перегонів - рекомендовано до ознайомлення. 
Всім гонщикам, які захоплюються хардкором - MUST HAVE.
Всі інші можуть навіть не пробувати, шанс, що гра вам буде до вподоби - мізерний

368853.review:
This game has so much variety it's hard to write a review in limited space. At core the game combines the mechanics of a puzzler with a race driver, but the emphasis is squarely on the driving and the driving is FUN. Unfortunately there's little real racing going on since 90% of your time is spent in "time attack" mode, but online play allows for real-time competitive time attack. There's a bazillion user created racetracks to download and master on top of the built in designs and your success earns money allowing you to buy new cars, track elements. There are seven different track environments and seven car types which are uniquely challenging, and the design of the tracks can become absolutely diabolical when gunning for a perfect score. As a break from beating the existing tracks you can try building your own tracks through the money you've earned and see how creative you can get, it's like a kids slot car toy on steroids.

Highly recommended!

This game is really awesome racing game, with completely simple look of the idea of racing. You should only care about time you have in finish of the race. 

Sounds easy? Well at first, yes, but you should know, that it's not that easy. There are many levels, where you should firstly try them many times to find best way to the end.

This is just small info about the game, well take a look more closer.

TrackMania United is the paid game based on [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/11020/]TrackMania Nations Forever[/url], which is free. You can try it and take a look at the race model and have big fun too. In the United edition you find many more stuff, like many game modes from simple to multi player races, you can compete with your own time, your friends and whole community over the internet, and you should know that the community is huge!

There are even competitions with real world standings so if you fall into this game, you should make much time to spend it here :D. You can choose to play as single player at the beginning, if you are worried to know how bad racer you are ;-) but practise makes perfect, so you will have great progress in time. 

Single player is all about having better and better times and to get medals - from bronze to gold, but if you obtain better time than creator of the map (or let's say something like par in golf) you will get [url=http://en.tm-ladder.com/time_page/images/author.png]green Nadeo medal[/url], and be happy :D. One more thing: with winning medals you get in-game currency named coopers.

OK, let's continue, medals you can get in races from classical races, to platform, stunt and puzzle races in many environments where the stadium one is similar in Nations version. 

There is availability to modify your vehicles - at least the design of color and stickers, you can even write something on your car - place there your national flag or so ...

The last but not least option is to make your own track and if you will be good in it, you can show it to the community and compete your time with theirs.

The game is really great and if you want to take a break from killing creatures or from saving worlds try this one and enjoy :)

Not entirely your conventional racing game, and this one is free to download and comes with enough content to make you think you've downloaded a full game.

The gameplay is primarily a time attack kind of deal. While you can see other cars in multiplayer, you can't actually crash into them, unlike a game like Burnout for example. Your only focus is to complete a track as fast as possible... or in some cases just simply complete the track (believe me when I say this is NOT an easy thing to do all the time, particularly in the player created tracks).

The premium "Forever Star Edition" version takes that free base content and then multiplies it tenfold, adding new racing vehicles with their own unique handling / track types / speed, and further expands upon the track creator also available in the free version.

It's a free game, with a completely optional full version available on the side, and a track editor, what's not to recommend? Give it a shot.

You’ll experience giant jumps, insane turns, and tracks set in unique locations such as a castle, the desert or on ice. Fast, fun and entertaining gameplay is what gaming is all about.  TrackMania is another welcomed addition to our world of entertaining PC games.  From the great graphics, fun gameplay, and amazing concept, TrackMania provides a might punch in a small package.  However, the repetitive music and repetitive gameplay might leave some gamers looking for the brake pedal.  TrackMania should provide enough entertainment value to keep gamers driving for a long time to come.

Remember STUNTS? Remember how in-between exploiting bugs for hilarious results there was a pretty ambitious racing game with the ability to create set pieces cooler than any Need For Speed or Burnout did, and all in 16 colors? Guess what, this is like that, but with good graphics and more set pieces. And that's just the part you get for free.

60370.review:
Note that there's a free version on Steam called Trackmania Nations Forever. Compared to United, Nations is (I think) restricted to one racing mode and one themed set of tracks/cars. It's a great demo, actually a pretty great game in itself... no reason not to try it!

I've mostly just played Trackmania singleplayer, in time-trial mode (same mode as in Nations). The races are short, some of the early ones just a few seconds long. Restarting a race is instant. Typically when you're aiming for a gold medal time you will restart whenever you make a mistake, trying over and over for the perfect clean run.

I don't really get into some of the massive-retries games like Trials or Super Meat Boy, but for some reason Trackmania hits the spot. Maybe because it's so colorful, fast, and generally gonzo. If games have mottos, Trackmania's is "WHEEEEEEEEE!". :-)

Update: this is also a surprisingly great LAN party game, especially in "rounds" mode.

You guys really must give this game a go. It is fast, furious and damned frustrating chasing the extra hundredths of a second needed to grab that next medal. The best part is that you can play a free version of Trackmania - "Trackmania Nations" - to test it out an the Stadium circuits and see if you like it, then you can jump right in and purchase the full version.

World leaderboards and an extensive community for additional track downloads and on-line head to head match races add to the excitement. So what are you waiting for!

I give it 4 stars out of 5, cause NO game is beyond improving.
